user.name: Zack Petersen
user.bio: Senior Software Engineer skilled in Python, Go, cloud tech. Expert in scalable systems, microservices, CI/CD. Passionate about AI and automation.

node.name: ai-code-reviewer
node.description: AI Code Reviewer is an automated tool that uses artificial intelligence to enhance code reviews. It integrates with GitHub Actions to analyze pull requests, providing feedback and suggestions for code improvements. This project aims to streamline development workflows, boost code quality, and reduce manual effort in the review process.

node.name: timecard
node.description: Timecard is a full-stack web app for employee time tracking and project management. Built with Django, Vue.js, and AWS, it features tiered permissions, geolocation, and real-time analytics. This production-ready app demonstrates scalability, processing over 30,000 entries since May 2021. It showcases API development and cloud deployment skills.
